title: Chilli mashed potatoes
ingredients: ['2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed', '4 large potatoes, peeled and chopped', '55g butter', '1 white onion, finely chopped', '1 small green chilli, seeded and minced', '3 tablespoons double cream', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
